com.foreach.across.modules.graphql.entity.configuration

Class GraphQLSchemaConfigurer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.graphql.entity.schema.GraphQLSchemaRegistrar
      • com.foreach.across.modules.graphql.entity.configuration.GraphQLSchemaConfigurer

  • public class GraphQLSchemaConfigurer
extends GraphQLSchemaRegistrar
    Can be used to manually configure a GraphQLSchema.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
